attributes.action: Replace social distancing with temperature screening in cinemas and theatres.
attributes.additional_details: If social distancing rules are not relaxed soon, the damage to the economy will shorten far more lives than the Covid-19 virus itself.
attributes.background: This would make it economic for more venues to open which will benefit the economy.

rejection.details:
The current guidance for keeping workers and customers safe during Covid-19, including through social distancing has been published by the UK Cinema Association, not the Government or House of Commons: https://www.cinemauk.org.uk/coronavirus-covid-19/guidance-for-cinemas/

We also couldn't publish a petition which appeared to imply that temperature checks made social distancing unnecessary. The Medicines and Healthcare products Regulatory Agency has published advice warning that temperature screening products are not a reliable way to detect if people have the virus.
